thread.title: Denzel Washington returns to the stage in Eugene O'Neill's 'The Iceman Cometh'

title: Denzel Washington returns to the stage in Eugene O'Neill's 'The Iceman Cometh'
text:
Denzel Washington returns to the stage in Eugene O'Neill's 'The Iceman Cometh' 4:32pm EDT - 01:00 
The veteran actor says he's always been a fan of O'Neill and calls the play an adventure. Rough cut (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
